channel.title: Monster energy sword (no not as in halo energy sword)
channel.description:
coon hunter suggested this in my monster energy shield thread so here is is for the sword
first screenie
[IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/30jptfr.jpg[/img]
mirroring it so i can bring them closer together and close in the gaps and stuff
second screenie
[IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/5fncc3.jpg[/img]
will post pics as i progress

item.title: Monster energy sword (no not as in halo energy sword)
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I think you should flip it upside down, as you could grip that part jutting out with the outer part of your hand and effectively use it as a sword.
